speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. Am I speaking with Sarah Johnson?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Sarah. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, could you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Sarah. I also need to confirm your current address for security purposes.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I see you have a balance of $450. How would you like to handle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $150 today and set up a payment plan for the rest.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds great. I can help you set up a payment plan for the remaining balance. Do you want to proceed with the payment now?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I’ll do that. What payment methods do you accept?

speaker: Agent
text: We accept credit/debit cards and bank transfers. Which would you prefer?

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect! I will guide you through the payment process. Thank you for your cooperation.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your help, Mark.
